original_text: The things that you want to do as a weak person are opposite to the things that God's Spirit wants. The things that God's Spirit wants are the opposite of what we want as weak people. Our own thoughts fight against what God's Spirit wants us to do. As a result, you are not free to do the things that you really want to do.
korean_text: 육체의 소욕은 성령을 거스르고 성령은 육체를 거스르나니 이 둘이 서로 대적함으로 너희가 원하는 것을 하지 못하게 하려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: The things that you want to do
as a weak person are opposite
to the things that God's Spirit wants
The things that God's Spirit wants
are the opposite of what we want
what God's Spirit wants us to do
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님의 영이 우리에게 하라고 원하시는 것에 대해

sentences.original_text: As a result, you are not free
to do the things that you really want to do
sentences.korean_translation: 정말 하고 싶은 것들을 하기 위해
